result.title: Tough Cubs' Contest, 8 Oct 2016, 1500 UTC
result.content:
We are pleased to announce that Toph, a Bangladeshi contest platform, is starting a bimonthly online programming contest for school and high school students, and anyone who is interested in getting started with sport programming! You can expect some relatively easy problems in this contest.

The first contest of this series will take place on 8 October, 2016 at 1500 UTC. There will be four problems and 90 minutes to solve them. Scoring follows ACM-ICPC rules. Here's the registration link: Register

Prizes :The top 5 contestants ( currently studying in Bangladeshi schools and high schools ) will be awarded exclusive Toph goodies.

The tasks were prepared by: hasib (Hasib Al Muhaimin), Sherlock221b (Imran Hasan) and me, Labib666 (Labib Rashid). We would like to thank hjr265 and his team for the awesome platforms: Toph and Drafts.

The score distribution will be announced later.

We hope everyone will find the problems interesting to solve. Good luck and have fun! :)
